content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Mark vulnerability risk events as dismissed, accepted, or remediated June 17, 2024—As with risk events in other risk factors, you may now mark events in the vulnerabilities risk factor as remediated, dismissed, or accepted. The new workflow helps streamline the process of managing risk events and CVEs. Cyber Risk Exposure Management → Threat and Exposure Management © 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated. All rights reserved.Search Knowledge Base

metadata.title: Mark vulnerability risk events as dismissed, accepted, or remediated
